sentences.english: 'I am, ' replied the Doger. 'I'd scorn to be anything else.
sentences.chinese: “是啊，”機靈鬼答道，“別的行當我還瞧不上呢。”
納佐林機靈地看了她一眼。

sentences.english: Would you not rather have your precious little ingenue?
sentences.chinese: 你們不想讓你們那個機靈的小寶貝演主角了？

sentences.english: Such is the theory of the skilful.
sentences.chinese: 這便是那些機靈人的理論。

sentences.english: Also, who is smart like seismograph, omnipotent spy Xiao Ma.
sentences.chinese: 還有，一個如地震儀般機靈，又無所不能的特務小馬。

sentences.english: And thus the Slinky was born.
sentences.chinese: 就這樣機靈鬼玩具誕生了。

sentences.english: The cow mama immediately and cannily starts leave-taking.
sentences.chinese: 牛嬤嬤立刻機靈地起身告辭。

sentences.english: Look at that cute puppy; he is chewing on a bone.
sentences.chinese: 看看那個機靈可愛的小狗，它正在咬一根骨頭。

sentences.english: Judith is a sprightly youg woman.
sentences.chinese: 朱迪思是個機靈的姑娘。

sentences.english: Young Singaporeans seem to lack the astuteness and dynamism that they possess.
sentences.chinese: 本地的一般年輕人似乎就缺少了那份機靈和朝氣。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, humor should base on sense, with wise novelty.
sentences.chinese: 雖然如此，幽默應該建立在機靈的新奇感之上。

sentences.english: The small white rabbit is a kind of temperament is tender and very clever animals.
sentences.chinese: 小白兔是一種性情溫柔又非常機靈的小動物。

sentences.english: Look at that small cute doy,it is biting one piece bone;
sentences.chinese: 看看那個機靈可愛的小狗，它正在咬一根骨頭。

sentences.english: Li Yea. I'm a smart girl that speaks with a smart accent.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，我是個機靈的姑娘，說話帶有時髦的腔調。

definition: slow in one's reactions/sluggish (in movement or thought)
to do what one is told/obedient
to be loyal (to one's friends)/to value loyalty
to take care of one's family
the cool eye of a bystander/a detached point of view
to only want to have a good time/to just want to have fun, and to shy away from self-discipline
